scripts.release-ts: echo 'new version' > version.txt && pnpm run --filter cute-cats-terminal release
scripts.release-py: echo 'new version' > version.txt && pnpm run --filter @cute_cats_terminal/py release
scripts.version-ts: echo 'new version' > version.txt && pnpm run --filter cute-cats-terminal version
scripts.version-py: echo 'new version' > version.txt && pnpm run --filter @cute_cats_terminal/py version
